form.PN:
pri prvih treh pomenih besedo izgovarjamo
/w*u*:nd/
, pri 4. pa
/w*a*Und/
.

sense.def:
A wound
je zareza na delu telesa, posebej taka, ki jo povzroči orožje ali oster predmet.

seg.quote: He died from his wounds nine days after the shooting.
The wound on his face was burning.

sense.def:
To wound someone
pomeni nekomu poškodovati telo z orožjem.

seg.quote: He had been badly wounded in the fighting.

sense.def:
To be wounded by what someone says or does
pomeni čutiti se prizadete ali vznemirjene zaradi tistega, kar nekdo reče ali stori;

seg.quote: She had been grievously wounded by his words.

sense.def:
Wound
je tudi preteklik in pretekli deležnik večine pomenov glagola
to wind
.
